Text:
Let us pray.
We seek You, Lord, here in the quiet with humbled voices. [t] Today we have found You as we celebrated the mystery of Your resurrection. [*] Let us now rest. Grant us Your peace, and safety from all evils. Help us wake tomorrow with joyful spirits, praising You, Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Update the casing of pronouns used for God.
2022-08-09 - Paul Prins: Rewrite most of the prayer for flow, clarity, and create a sense of unity.
